title: BCD-watch: Changes Report (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 12 May 2025 through Monday, 19 May 2025🔗

Browser Support Changes: +5, -0

Support increases (5)

API

  1. api ➞ Document ➞ parseHTML_static
    Added to Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ➞ at-rules ➞ font-face ➞ font-width
    Added to Safari  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ font-width ➞ percentage
    Added to Safari  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. css ➞ types ➞ if
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

SVG

  1. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ font-width
    Added to Safari  ➞  1 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 65

Show all 65 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (31)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 9 May 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api ➞ FontFace ➞ worker_support
    Backfilled for Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ FontFaceSet ➞ worker_support
    Backfilled for Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  3. api ➞ Element ➞ setHTML
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines

    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines

    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  10. api ➞ Sanitizer ➞ removeElement
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  11. api ➞ Sanitizer ➞ removeUnsafe
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  12. api ➞ Sanitizer ➞ replaceElementWithChildren
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  13. api ➞ Sanitizer ➞ setComments
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  14. api ➞ Sanitizer ➞ setDataAttributes
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines

JAVASCRIPT

    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. javascript ➞ operators ➞ import ➞ options_parameter
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  3. javascript ➞ builtins ➞ Intl ➞ Locale ➞ getWeekInfo ➞ returns_minimalDays_property
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ align-content ➞ normal
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  9. css ➞ properties ➞ row-gap ➞ normal
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

New entries (32)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 9 May 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (“Removed BCD entries”) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

JAVASCRIPT

  1. javascript ➞ builtins ➞ Intl ➞ Locale ➞ getWeekInfo ➞ returns_minimalDays_property

SVG

  1. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ font-width

Removed entries (2)

The entries in this section were found in BCD on Friday, 9 May 2025, but are no longer present. The reasons for this removal can be anything from an experimental proposal that was never supported to a property or value being renamed to something else.

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ accent-color ➞ maintains_contrast

HTML

  1. html ➞ elements ➞ textarea ➞ spellcheck
  • Previous report: Monday, 12 May 2025

BCD Watch: A service of

This report was generated by diffing v6.0.13 (Friday, 9 May 2025) and v6.0.15 (Friday, 16 May 2025)

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (68)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 2 May 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

items.content_html:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 28 April 2025 through Monday, 5 May 2025🔗

Browser Support Changes: +0, -0

BCD Metadata Changes: 1

Show all 1 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (1)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 25 April 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ white-space ➞ shorthand_values
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines

No features were added to BCD in this time period.
